dialog_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete {} permanently? You can't undo this action.
edit_error_all_titles_empty: You need to add at least one title.
edit_error_max_progress_less_than_actual: Max progress value is smaller than the progress value.
filter_abandoned_desc: Things you are no longer interested in and haven't finished.
filter_ended_desc: Things that have have max progress that won't change.
filter_ongoing_desc: Things with indefinite max progress (Max progress can change in the future).
statistics_avg_day_last_month_title: Average daily progress in the last 30 days
statistics_daily_month_title: Daily progress for the last month
statistics_monthly_year_title: Monthly progress for the last year
statistics_weekday_title: Progress on each day of the week (last 3 months)
